title: Pixel 3a xl RMA Nightmare in the UK
content:
Start of last week I left my Pixel 3a XL uncharged for 2 days and when I came to charge it, it would not charge.

I have tried the recommended Google troubleshooting and several different chargers but nothing will bring it back to life!

I have been trying to log a RMA on the UK website since last Thursday but it never opens even during normal UK office hours.

I have been in conversation on twitter with @madebygoogle for the last 3 days but they are just sending me around in circles (I guess just hoping I will go away).

I have warranty coverage till July this year.

Can anyone else recommend another way to escalate this please I would be very grateful ?

Its been so long now that I have had to buy a new phone just when I can least afford it and I can tell you its NOT made by google.

I am really shocked on how poor and shoddy the service is from such a big technology company.

Does anyone from Google monitor this forum ?

Simon
